# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal mining operation at position(x=43.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of a Burner Mining Drill at position(x=43.0, y=-82.0), a Furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0), and several Chests at positions(x=42.5, y=-83.5), (x=44.5, y=-81.5), (x=45.5, y=-80.5), and (x=43.5, y=-79.5). The Burner Mining Drill is used for mining coal, and the Furnace is used for smelting. The Chests are used for storing coal and other items.

### Coal transportation system at position(x=43.5, y=-80.5)
Consists of a Burner Inserter at position(x=43.5, y=-80.5) that transports coal from the Chest at position(x=44.5, y=-81.5) to the Chest at position(x=43.5, y=-79.5).

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when mining coal
- Ensure that the Chest at the drop position is not full before mining coal.
- Refuel the Burner Mining Drill when it runs out of fuel.
### Errors when smelting items
- Ensure that the Furnace has ingredients to smelt before attempting to smelt.
- Ensure that there is iron ore in the inventory before attempting to smelt iron plates.
### Errors when using the Burner Inserter
- Ensure that the Burner Inserter has a source of items to pick up before attempting to use it.
- Ensure that the drop position of the Burner Inserter is not occupied by another entity.
